attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LcBBD6lnJvLkqPoJKey_description
attribs.current: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LcBBD6lnJvLkqPoJKf1_desc
attribs.current: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LcBBD6lnJvLkqPoJKf1_description
attribs.current: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-Ml8PZh4vGER2tbvqfms_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: The stem of a plant with thorns

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-Ml8PZh4vGER2tbvqfms_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at your command toward a creature in range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes 1d6 piercing damage, and if the creature is Large or smaller, you pull the creature up to 10 feet closer to you.

This spells damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).
